short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Student Fee Related Calculations, Automated Voucher Printing and Agent Tickets Dashboard Styling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Exclusively for Indus University:

The student's fee calculation is a structured process that takes into account various factors. Voucher Generation is also a vital feature, involving the addition and subtraction of relevant values, with special attention given to prioritizing specific fields. For example, ID Card Fees and fines take precedence over Tuition Fees.

Ticketing System is also been modified

This plugin offers the following features:

Accounts
=========
- Real-Time Fee Percentage
- Generate Voucher Button Shortcut
- Quick Voucher Entry Box (Simply enter the amount and press Enter)
- 50% & 100% Voucher Hyperlinks (One-click saving of vouchers)
- Auto Open Pending and Unexpired Vouchers (Works only with most updated version of Chrome)
- New IDs now come with headers and footers in their ledger, complete with comprehensive details.
- Distinct color schemes applied to table elements

Ticketing System
==============

- NEW Tickets will show first (With Blinking New Tag)
- Urgent Tickets will show next (with pink background color)
- Seen Tickets will show next (Tickets whom are seen but no acitivity has been done)
- In Waiting Tickets shows Next (with yellow back ground color)
- Ready For Collection Will show next (with green background color)
- Approval Sent Will Show next (with gray background color)
- Student Feedback Required will show next (with Blue Background color)

Experience enhanced functionality and efficiency with this plugin, tailored exclusively for Indus University."
